text: OK, so what is momentum play?
Momentum order flow pattern is when the market seeks new value territory whilst in price
discovery mode.
So you'll have a certain range of the market, so you'll have this range where the market
is oscillating between and whilst it's oscillating between, once it really escapes that range
or escapes that zone as the market has been compressed into a tight range or a
as it leaves that area, it's a new price discovery mode.
So another typical name for momentum play is a breakout trading

it can be effectively
